lead_paragraph: Top-ranked tennis player Novak Djokovic says canceling the Olympics "is unthinkable" and, "for the moment," he is still planning to compete at the Rio de Janiero Games, despite worries about the Zika virus.
snippet: Top-ranked tennis player Novak Djokovic says canceling the Olympics "is unthinkable" and, "for the moment," he is still planning to compete at the Rio de Janiero Games, despite worries about the Zika virus....

headline.main: 'For the Moment,' Djokovic Plans to Compete at Rio Olympics
headline.print_headline: 'For the Moment,' Djokovic Plans to Compete at Rio Olympics
